Translations.Text: Yeh log kis chez kay bary mein poch gach ker rahy hein
Us bari khabar kay mutaliq
Jiss kay bary mein yeh ikhtylaf ker rahay hein
Yaqenan yeh abhi jan lein gay
Phir bil yaqeen inhein buhat jald maloom hojaey ga
kiya hum nay zameen ko farsh nahi banaya
Aur paharon ko mikhein(nahi banaya)
Aur hum nay tumhein jora jora paida kiya
Aur hum nay tumhari nend ko aram ka sabab banaya
Aur rat ko hum nay parda banaya hay
Aur din ko hum nay waqat e rozgar banaya
Aur tumhary opper hum nay 7 masboot asman banaey
Aur ik chamkta howa roshan chiragh(soraj)paida kiya
Aur badlon say hum nay bakasrat bhyta hoa pani barsaya
Atky us say anaj or sabza ugaein
Aur ghanay bagh(bhi ugay)
be-shak faislay kay din ka waqat mukarer hay
Jiss din kay sor mein phonka jaey ga phir tum foj der foj chaly ao gay
Aur asman khol diaya jaey ga to is mein darwazy darwazy hojaein gay
Aur pahar chaly jaein gay pus wo sarab hojaein gay
Be-shak dozakh ghat mein hay
sarkashon ka thikana wohi hay
Is mein wo mudaton tak pary rahein gay
Na kabhi is mein khunki ka maza chakein gay na pani ka
Siwaey garm pani aur(beyti)peep kay
(Unko)pora pora badla milay ga
Unhein to hisab ki tawaqa hi na thi
Aur bebaki say hamari ayton ki takzeb kerty thy
Hum nay her ik chez ko likh ker shumar ker rakah hay
Ab tum(apnay kiey ka )maza chako hum tumhara azab bhi barhaty rahein gay
Yaqeenan perhezgar logon kay liey kamyabi hay
Baghat hein or angoor hay
Aur nojawan kunwari hum omer auratein hein
Aur chalkty hoy jam sharab hein
Wahan na to who byhoda batein sunein gay aur na jhoti batein sunein gay
(Unko) tery rab ki taraf say (unkay nek amal ka)yeh badla milay ga jo kafi inam hoga
(Is rab ki taraf say milay ga jo kay)asmano ka aur zameen ka aur jo kuch in kay dermiyan hay inka perwardigar hay aur bari bakhsish kernay wala hay kisi ko is say bat chet kerney ka ikhtyar nahi hoga
Jiss din roh or faristy safein bandh ker khary hongay to koi kalam na kersakay ga magar jis say rehman ijazat dayday aur wo thek bat zaban say nikalay
Yeh din haq hay ab jo chaeiy apnay rab kay pass (nek amal kerkay) thikana banalein
Hum nay tumhein unqareeb anay walay azab say dara diya(aur chokanna ker diya) hai. jis din insan apnay haton ki kamai ko dekh ly gaur kafir kahy ga kay kash!mein mitti hojata
Doob ker sakhti say khenchnay walon ki qasam
Band khol ker chora dyney walon ki qasam
Aur terney phirnay walon ki qasam
Phir dor ker agy barhnay walon ki qasam
Phir kam ki tadbeer kernay walon ki qasam
Jis din kanpney wali kanpe gi
Us ky bad ik peechy aney wali (peechy peechy) aye gi
(buhat se)dil us din dharakty hongy
Gin ki nigahen nichi hongien
kehty hein ke kiya hum pehli ki si halat ki taraf phir lot aye jaein gay
Kiya us waqt jab ke hum bosida hadiyaan hojaein gay
Kehty hein ke phir to ye lotna nuksandeh hay
(maloom hona chaiey)wo to sirf ik (khufnak)dant hay
Kay (jis kay zihar hoty hi )wo ik dam medan mein jama hojaein gay
Kiya Musa (aleh e salam)ki khabar tumhein phunchi hay
Jabkay unhein unkay rab nay pak medan TUA mein pukara
(kay)tum firoon kay pass jao unsay sirkashi ikhtyar kerli hay
ussy kaho kay kiya to apnai durstagi or islah chata hy
Aur yeh ky mein tujhhy terey Rab ki rah dikhata takay tu (uss say) darnay lagy
Pus ussay bari nishani dikhai
To us ney jhutlaya aur na fermani ki
Phir palta dor dhoop kertay huye
Phir sabb ko jama kerty pukaara
Tum sab ka rab mein hi hun
To(sab say buland o baala)) Allah ney bhi usay aakhrat ky aur duneya ky azab mein giriftaar kerliya
Be-shak is mein is shaks kay liye ibrat hy jo daray
Kiya tumhara peda kerna zadadushwar hy ya aasman ka
Iss ki bulandi unchi ki phir issay theek thak kerdia
Is ski raat ko tareek banaya aur iss kay din ko nikala
Aur is kay baad zameen ko (humwaar)bicha diya
Iss mein say paani aur chaara nikala
Aur paharon ko (mazboot) ghar diya
Yeh sab tumhary aur tumhary janwaron kay fiady kat liey (hein)
Aur jab wo bari afat(qiyamat) ayegi
Jiss din kay insan apnay kiey hoy kamon ko yad kery ga
Aur (her)dekhney waly kay samaney jahanum zahir ki jaey gi
To jiss(shaks) nay sarkashi ki (hogi)
Aur duneyawi zindagi ko tarjeeh di(hogi)
(uska)thikana jahanum hi hay
Han jo shaks apnay rab kay samaney khara honay say darta raha hogaaur apnay nafas ko khuwahish say roka hoga
To uska thikana janat hi hay
Log ap say qiyamat kay waqay honay ka waqat daryafat kerty hein
Ap ko is kay biyan kernay say kiaya taaluq
Isskay ilam ki inteha to Allah ki janib hay
Ap to sirf issy derty rahney walon ko agha kernay walay hein
Jis roz ye ussay dekh lein gay to asa malom hoga kay sirf din ka akhiri hisa ya awal hisa hi(duniya mein)rahy hein
Wo turush ro howa aur mon mor lia
(sirf isliey)kay uskay pass ik nabina aya
Tujhy kia khabar shayad wo sanwar jata
Ya nasehat sunta or usy nesehat fiada phunchati
Jo be parwaii kerta hay
Uski taraf to pori twaja kerta hy
halankay us kay na sanwarney say tujh per koi ilzam nahi
Aur jo shaks tery pass dorta hoywa ata hay
Aur wo der (bhi) raha hay
To us say byrukhi barta hay
Yeh thek nahi quran is nasehat (ki chez) hay
jo chahy ussy nasehat ly
(ye to)purazmat sahifon mein hay
Jo buland o bala or pak saf hein
Asy likhney walon kay haton mein hy
Jo buzurgh or pakbaz hein
Allah ki mar insan per kaisa nashukra hay
Ussy Allah nay kis chez say paida kiya
Ussy ik nutfay say phir andazy per rakha ussko
Phir us kay liey rasta asan kiya
Phir usy mot di aur phir qabar mein dafan kiya
Phir jab chaey ga zinda ker day ga
Hergiz nahi unsay ab tak Allah kay hokum ki byja awari nahi ki
Insan ko chahye kay apnay khaney ko dekhy
Kay hum nay khob pani barsaya
Phir phara zamen ko achi tarah
Phir is mein anaj ugaey
Or angoor or tarkari
Aur zeitoon or khajoor
Aur gunjan baghat
Aur mywa(aur ghass)chara(bhi ugaya)
Tumhary istamal o faidy kay liey or tumhary chopayon kay liey
Pus jab kay kan bhyray ker dyney wali (qiyamat)ajaey gi
Us din admi apnay bhai say
Aur apni maa or bap say
Aur apni biwi or apni ulad say bhagy ga
in mein say her ik ko us din asi fikar(damengeer)hogi jo uskay liey kafi hogi
Us din bohat say chehry roshan hongy
Jo hansty hoy aur hashshash bashshash hongay
Aur baht say chehry usdin ghubar alod hon gay
Jis per siyahi charhi hoi hogi
wo yehi kafir badkirdar log hon gay
Jab sooraj lappet liya jaey ga
Aur jab sitary by noor hojaein gay
Aur jab pahar chalaye jaein gya
Aur jab das mah ki hamla oontniyan chor di jaein gi
Aur jab wehshi janwar ikhattay kiey jaein gay
Aur jab samander bharka diey jaien gay
Aur jab janein (jimson say) mila dein jaein gein
Aur jab zinda gari hoi larki say sawal kiya jaey ga
Kay kis gunha ki waja say wo qatal ki gae
Aur jab nama amal khol diey jaein gay
Aur jab asman ki khal utar li jaey gai
Aur jab jahanum bharkai jaei gi
Aur jab jant nazdek kerdi jaey gi
To us din her shaks jan lyga jo kuch yeh ker aya hoga
Mein qasam khata hon pechay hatnay waly
Chalnay phirney waly chupney waly sitaron ki
Aur rat ki jab janey lagy
Aur subha ki jab chamek ney lagy
Yaqenan yeh ik buzrug rasool ka kaha howa hay
Jo qooat wala hay arsh waly (Allah) kay nazdek buland martaba hay
Jis ki (asmanon mein)ita-at ki jati hay amen hy
Aur tumhara sathi dewana nahi hay
isnay us(farishty)ko asman kay kholy kinary per dekha bhi hay
Aur yeh ghaib ki baton ko batlaney mein bakhil bhi nahi
Aur yeh quran shytan mardod ka kalam nahi
Phir tum kahan jarahy ho
Yeh to tamam jahan walon kay liey nasehat nama hay
(bilkhosos)us kay liey jo tum mein say sedhi rah per chalna chahy
Aur tum baghair parwardigar e alam kay chahaye kuch nahi chah saktay
jab asman phat jaey ga
Aur jab sitary jhar jaein gay
Aur jab samander bhy niklein gay
Aur jab qabreen (shak kerky) ukhar di jaey gi
(us waqat)her shaks apnay agy bhyjy hoy aur pechay chory hoy(yani agly pechly amal)ko maloom ker lyga
Ay insan tujhy apnay rab e karim say kis chez nay bhykaya
Jis(rab nay)tujhy paida kiya phir thek thak kiya phir (durust)baraber banaya
Jis sorat mein chaha tujhy jor diya
Hergiz nahi balky tum to jaza o saza kay din ko jhotlaty ho
Yaqenan tum per nigheban izat waly
Likhney waly muqerer hein
Jo kuch tum kerty ho wo janty hein
Yaqenan nek log(jant kay assh o aram aur)nematon mein hongay
Aur yaqenan bad kar log dozakh mein hongy
Badly waly din is mein jaein agy
Wo is say kabhi ghaib na honey paein gay
Tujhy kuch khabar bhi hay kay badlay ka din kiya hay
Mein tujhy phir (khyta hun kay )tujhay kiya maloom kay jaza (aur saza) ka din kiya hay
Wo hay jis din koi shaks kisi shaks kay liye kissi cheez ka mukhtar na hoga aur (tamam ter) ehkaam us roz Allah kay hi hongay
Bari kharabi hay nap tool mein kami kerney walon ki
kay jab logon say nap kerlyty hein to pora pora lyty hein
Aur jab inhein nap ker ya tool ker dyty hein to kam dyty hein
kiya inhen apney marney kay bad ji uthney ka khayal nahi
us azeem din kay liey
Jis din sab log rab ul alameen kay samnay khary hongy
yaqenan badkaron ka nama e amal sijeen mein hay
Tujhy kiya maloom sijeen kiya hay
(yeh to)LIkhi hoi kitab hay
Us din jhotlaney walon ki bari khrabi hay
Jo jaza o saza kay din ko jhotlaty hein
Issy sirf wohi jhotlata hay jo had say agy nikal janey wala(aur) ghunaghar hota hay
Jab iskay samnay hamari ayatein parhi jati hein to keh dyta hay kay yeh aglon kay afsaney hein
Yun nahi balky in kay dilon per in kay amal ki waja say zang (charh gaya)hai
Hergiz nahi yeh log us din apnay rab say oat mein rakhy jaein gay
Phir yeh log bil yaqen jahanum mein jhonky jaein gay
Phir keh diya jaey ga kay yehi hay wo jissy tum jhotlaty rahy
Yaqenan yaqenan nekokaron ka nam e amal illieen mein hay
Tujhy kiya pata kay illieen kiya hay
(wo to) likhi hoi kitab hay
Muqarab (farishty)iska mushahida kerty hein
Yaqeena nek log (bari)nematon mein hongy
Mesherion per bethy dekh rahy hongy
To in kay chehron say hi nematon ki taro tazgi phychan lay ga
Yeh log sir ba mehar khalis sharab pilaey jaeingy
Jiss per mushk ki muhar hogi sabqat lay jeney walon ko isi mein sabqat kerni chahiey
Aur isi ki amyzish tasneem ki hogi
(Yani) wo chashma jis ka pani muqarab log piyein gay
Gunha gar log iman walon ki hansi uraya kerty thy
Aur in kay pass say guzarty hoy apas mein ankh kay isahry kerty thy
Aur jab apnay walon ki taraf lot ty to dil lageyan kerty thy
Aur jab inhein dekhty to kehty yaqeenan yeh log ghumrah(berah) hein
Yeh in per pasban bana ker to nahi bhyjy gay
Pus aj iman waly in kafiron per hansein gay
Takhaton per bethy dekh rahy hongy
Kay abb in munkiron nay jaisa yeh kerty thay poora poora badla pa liya
Jab asman phat jaey ga
Aur apney rab kay hokum per kan lagaey ga aur issi kay laiq wo hay
Aur jab zameen (khench ker)phela di jaey gi
Aur iss mein jo hai ussay wo ugal degi aur khali hojaigi
Aur apney rab ky hokoom per kaan lagaye gi aur isi kay laeeq wo hy
Aey insaan! Tu apney rab say milney tak yeh koshish aur tamam kaam aur mehnatein kerky ussymulaqatkerney wala hy
To(us waqt) jis shaks kydahaney hath mein aamaal naama diya jaiyga
Us ka hisab to bari aasani say liya jaey ga
Aur wo apney ehal ki taraf hansi khushi lot ayega
Han jis shaks ka aamaal nama us ki peeth ky peechy say diya jaey ga
To wo maut ko bulaney lagyga
Aur bharakti hui jahanum meindakhil hoga
Yeh sahks apnay mutalqeen mein(duniya mein)khush tah
Isska khayal tah kay Allah ki taraf loot ker hi na jaey ga
Que nahi hanlankay iska rab usy bakhobi dekh raha tha
mujhy shafaq ki qasam!aur rat ki
Aur iski jama kerda chezon ki qasam
Aur chand ki jab kay wo kamil hojata hay
Yaqenan tum ik halat say dosri halat per phuncho gay
Inhein ki hogaya kay iman nahi laty
Aur jab in kay pass quran parha jata hay to sajda nahi kerty
balky jinhon nay kufur kiya wo jhotla rahy hein
aur Allah khob janta hay jo kuch yah dilon mein rakhty hein
Inhen alamnak azabon ki khush khabri suna do
Han eman walon aur nek amal walon be shumar aur na khtam honey wala ajar hay
Burjoon waly asman ki qasam
Wada kiey hoy din ki qasam
Hazir honey waly aur hazir kiey hoy ki qasam
(kay) kahndaqon waly halak kiey gay
Wo ik aag thi endhan wali
jab kay wo log uskay ass pass bethy thy
Aur musalmano kay sath jo ker rahy thy us ko apney samney dekh rahy thy
Yeh log in musalmano(kay kisi aur gunha ka)badla nahi lay rahy thy siway iskay wo Allah galib laeeq e hamd ki zat per iman laey thy
jis kay liey asman o zameen ka mulk hay aur Allah Taalaa kay samney hy her chez
Be-shak jin logon na musalman mardon aur auraton ko sataya phir tooba (bhi)na ki to unkay liey jahanum ka azab hay aur jalney ka azab hay
Be-shak iman qabool kerney walo aur nek kam kerney walon kay liey wo baghat hein jin kay nechay nehrein beh rahi hein yehi bari kamyabi hay
Yaqennan tery rab ki pukar bari sakht hay
Wohi phyli martaba paida kerta hay aur wohi dobara paida kery ga
Wo bara bakhsish kerney wala aur bohat mohabat kernay wala hay
Arsh ka malik azmat wala hay
jo chahy usy ker guzarney wala hay
Tujhy lashkaron ki khabar bhi mili hay
(Yani)firon aur samood ki
(kuch nahi)balky kafir to jhotlaney mein pary hoy hein
Aur Allah bhi unhein her taraf say ghery hoy hy
Balkay yeh quran hay bari shan wala
loh e mahfooz mein (likha hua) hay
Qasam hay asman ki aur andhery mein roshan honay waly ki
Tujhy maloom bhi hay ky wo raat ko namodar honey wali chez kiya hay
Wo roshan sitara hay
Koi asa nahi jis per nigheban farishta na ho
Insan ko dekhna chaeiy kay kis chez say paida kiya gaya hay
Wo ik uchalty pani say paida kiya hay
Jo pait aur seney kay dirmiyan say nikalta hay
Be sahk wo usy pher lyney per yaqeenan qudrat rakhney wala hay
Jis din poshida bhedon ki janch partal hogi
To na hoga uskay pass kuch zor na madadgar
Barish waly asman ki qasam
Aur pahtney wali zameen ki qasam
Be-shak yeh (quran)albatta do tok faisla kerney wala kalam hai
Yeh hansi ki(aur be faeeda) baat nahi
Albatta kafir dao ghaat main nahi
Aur mein bhi aik chaal chalraha hun
Tu kafiron ko mohlat dey unhen thory dino chor dy
Apney buhat hi buland Allah kay nam ki pakizgi biyan ker
Jissney paida kiya aur sahi salim banaya
Aur jiss na(thek thak)andaza kiya aur phir rah dekhai
Aur jis nay taza ghass paida ki
Phir ussney is ko (sukha ker )siyah kora ker diya
Hum tujhy parhaein gay phir tu na bhoolay ga
Magar jo kuch Allah chahey wo zahir aur poshida ko janta hay
Hum apky liey asani paida kerdein gay
To ap nasehat kerty rahein ager nasehat kuch faida dy
Derney wala to nasehat lyga
(han)badbakht is say gurez karey ga
Jo bari aag mein jaey ga
Jahan phir won a mary ga jnajeiy ga(balky halat e nazah mein para rahy ga)
Besahk usney falah pali jo pak hogaya
Aur jis nay apney rab ka nam yad rakha aur namaz parhta raha
Lakin tum to duniya ki zindagi ko tarjeeh dyty ho
Aur akhrat buhat bhyter aur baqa wali hay
Yeh batein phyli kitabon mein bhi hein
(yani) Ibrahim aur Musa ki kitabon mein
Kiya tujhy bhi chopa lyney wali(qiyamat) ki khabar phunchi hay
Us din bohat say chehry zalil hongy
(aur) mehnat kerney walay thakay huye hongay
Woh dehakti hoi aag mein jaein gy
Aur nihayat garm chasmy ka pani unko pilaya jaey ga
in kay liey siway-e-kanty dar darkhton kay aur kuch khana na hoga
Jo na mota karey ga na bhook mitaey ga
Buhat say chehry usdin tar o taza aur(asoda hall) hongy
Apni koshish per khush hongy
Buland o bala janaton mein hongay
Jahan koi byhoda bat nahi sunein gaein
Jahan bhyta hoa chashma hoga
(Aur) us mein onchy onchy takht hongy
Aur aabkhory rakhy hoy(hongy)
Aur ik qatar mein lagy hoy takiey hongy
Aur makhmali masnadein pheli pari hongi
Kiya yeh onton ko nahi dekhty kay wok is tarah paida kiey gay hein
Aur asmano ko kay kis tarah oncha kiya gaya hay
Aur paharon ki tarf kay kis tarah gar dey gay hein
Aur zameen ki tarf kay kis tarah bechaei gai hay
Pus ap nasehat ker dia kerein (qk)ap sirf nasehat kerney waly hein
Ap kuch in per darogha nahi hein
Han jo shakhs rogardani kerty aur kufur kery
usy Allah Taalaa buhat bara azab dyga
be-shak hamari taraf inko lotna hay
Phir be-shak hamaray zimmay hay inn say hisab lena
Qasam hay fajar ki
Aur das raton ki
Aur juft aur taaq ki
Aur raat ki jab wo chalney lagy
Kiya inmein aqalmand kay wasty kafi qisam hay
Kiya ap ney nahi dekha ka yap kay rab nay Qom aad kay sath kiya kiya
Satoonon waly erum kay sath
Jis ki manind (koi qum) mulko mein paida nahi ki gai
Aur qum-e-samood kay sath jinho nay wadi mein bary bary pather trashy thy
Aur firoon kay sath jo meekhon wala tha
In sabhon nay shiron mein sir utha rakha tha
Aur bohat fasad macha rakha tha
Akhir tery rab nay in sab py azab ka kora barsaya
Yaqeenan tera rab ghat mein hay
Insan (ka yeh hal hay kay) jab ussy us ka rab azmata hay aur izat o neymat dyta hay to wo khyney lagta hay kay mery rab nay mujhy izat dar banadiya
aur jab wo usko azmata hay aur uski rozi tang kerdyta hay to wo kehney lagta hay kay mera rab nay meri ahanat ki hy(aur zalil kiya)
Aiaa herghiz nahi balkay (bat yeh hy) kay tum (hi)log yateemo ki izat nahi kerty
Aur miskino kay khilaney ki ik dosry ko targheeb nahi kerty
Aur (mardon ki)miras sameth sameth ker khaty ho
Aur maal ko ji bhar ker aziz rakhty ho
Yaqeenan jis waqat zameen koot koot ker baraber kerdi jaey gi
Aur tera rab(khud )ajaey ga aur farishty safen bandh ker(ajaey gay)
Aur jis din jhanum bhi lai jaey gi oss din insan ko samjh ayegi magar aj osky samjhney ka faida kahan
Wo kahy ga kay kash kay mein nay apni is zindagi kay liey kuch peshgi saman kiya hota
Pus aj Allah kay azab jaisa azab kisi ka na hoga
Na uski qaid o band jaisi kisi ki qaid o band hogi
Ay itmynan wali rooh
To apney rab ki taraf loot chal is tarah kay to issy razi wo tujh say khush
Pus mery khas bandon mein dakhil hoja
Aur meri jannat mein chali ja
Mein iss sher ki qasam khata hun
aur ap is sher mein muqeem hein
aur (qasam hy)insani bap aur olad ki
Yaqeenan hum ney insan ko(bari)mushaqat mein paida kia hy
kiya yeh guman kerta hy kay yeh kisis kay bas mein hi nai
khyta (phirta )hy ky mein ney to bohat kuch maal khrch ker dala
kiya(yun) samjhta hy ky kisi nay ussy dekha(hi ) nahi
kiya hum nay uski do ankhein nahi banain
aur zaban aur hunt(nahi banaey)
hum nay dekha diy usko dono rasty
So issy na hosakha kay ghatti mein dakhil hota
Aur kiya samjha ky ghatti hy kiya
Kisi garden(gulam londi)ko azad kerna
ya bhok waly din khana khilana
Kisi reshtydar yateem ko
Ya khahsaar miskeen ko
Phir unlogon mein say hojata jo iman laey aur ik dosry ko sabar ki aurreham kerney ki wasiyat kerty hein
Yehi log hein daein bazo waly(khushbakhti waly)
Aur jin logon nay humari aayaton kay sath kufur kiya yeh kam-bakhti waly hain
Inn hi per aag hogi jo charo taraf say gheri hoi hogi
Qasam hai sooraj ki aur uski dhoop ki
Qasam hai chand ki jab uskay peechay ay
Qasam hai din ki jab soraj ko numaya keray
Qasam hai raat ki jab ussay dhanp lay
Qasam hai aasman ki aur uskay bananey ki
Qasam hai zamen ki or ussy hamwar kernay ki
Qasam hai nafs ki or ussy durust bananey ki
phir samjh di usko badkari ki aur bach ker chalnay ki
Jiss nay ussay pak kiya wo kamyab hua
Aur jiss nay ussay khak mein mila diya wo nakam hoa
(Qom)samood nay apni sarkashi kay baees jhutlaya
Jab unka bara badbakht uth khara hoa
Unhein Allah kay rassol nay farmadiya tha kay Allah Taalaa ki ontni aur uss kay peeenay ki bari ki (hifazat karo)

Un logon nay apnay pyghamber ko jhota samjh ker uss ontni ki kochein kaat dein pus unkay rab nay unkay gunahon kay baees un per halakat dali aur phir halakat ko aam kerdiya aur uss basti ko barabar ker diya
Wo nahi darta uskay tabahkun anjam say
Qasam hai raat ki jab cha jaey
Aur qasam hai din ki jab roshan ho
Aur qasam hai uss zaat ki jiss nay nar-o-mada ko peda kiya
Yaqeenan tumhari koshish mukhtalif qisim ki hai
Jiss nay diya (Allah ki rah mein)aur dara (apnay rab say)
Aur nek baat ki tasdeq kerta rahega
To hum bhi usko aasan rasty ki saholat dein gay
Lekin jiss nay bakheel ki aur beparwai barti
Aur nek baat ki takzeeb ki
To hum bhi uski tangi-o-mushkil kay saman mayuser kerdein gay
Uska maal ussy(ondha)giraney kay waqat kuch kam na ay ga
Be-shak raah dikha dena himaray zimmay hai
Aur humary hi hath akhrat aurduniya hai
Mein nay to tumhein sholay marti hui aag say dara diya hai
Jiss mein sirf wo hi badbakht dakhil hoga
Jiss nay jhutlaya aur(uski perwi say)mun pher liya
Aur iss say assa shaks dor rakha jaey ga jo bara perhezgar hoga
Jo paaki hasil kernay kay liey apna maal deta hai
Kissi ka uss per koi ehsan nahi kay jiss ka badla diya jaraha ho
bulkay sirf apnay perwardigar buzruk-o-buland ki raza chahnay kay liey
Yaqeenan wo (Allah bhi) un qareeb raza mand hojaeyga
Qasam hai chasht kay waqt ki
Aur qasam hai raat ki jab cha jaey
Naa to tery rab nay tujhy chora hai aur na woh bezar hogaya hai
Yaqenan tery liey injam aghaz say behter hoga
Tujhy tere rab baht jald (inam )dyga aur to razi (o khush )hojaey ga
Kiya us nay tujhy yateem paker jagah nahi di
Aur tujhay raah bhola paker hidayat nahi di
Aur tujhy na-daar paaker to-nagar nahi banadiya
Pus yateem per to bhi sakhti na kiya ker
Aur na sawal kernay waly ko dant dapat
Aur apnay rab ki nematon ko biyan kerta reh
Kiya hum nay tera seena nahi khol diya
Aur tujh per say tera bojh hum ney utar diya
Jiss nay teri peth tordi thi
Aur hum nay tera zikar buland kerdiya
Pus yaqenan mushkil kay sath asani hai
By-shak mushkil kay sath asani hai
Pus jab to farigh ho to ibadat mein mehnat ker
Aur apney parwardigar hi ki tareef mein dil laga
Qasm hai enjeer ki aur zetoon ki
Aur toor seeneen ki
Aur iss aman walay sher ki
Yaqenan hum nay insan ko behtren soorat mein paida kia
Phir isssay neechon say necha kerdiye
lekin jo log eman laey aur (phir)nek amal kiey to inkay liey aisa ajar hai jo kabhi khatam na hoga
Pus tujhay abb roz jaza kay jhutlanay per konsi cheez amaadah kerti hai
Kiya Allah Taalaa (sabb) haakemon ka hakim nahi hai
Parh apnay rab kay naam say jiss nay peda kiya
Jiss nay insan ko khoon kay lothray say peda kiya
tu parhta reh tera rab baray karam wala hai
Jiss nay qalam kay zariye(ilm)sikhaya
Jiss nay insan ko who sikhaya jissay who nai janta tha
Such much insan to apnay say bahir hojata hy
isliey kay who apnay apko beparwah(ya tu nagar)samjhta hy hai
Yaqeenan lotna teray rab ki taraf hai
(Bhala)issay bhi tumnay dekha jo bandy ko rokta hai
Jabkay who banda salat ada kerta hai
Bahala batla to ager who hidayat per ho
Ya parhezgari ka hokum deta ho
Bhala dekho to agar yeh jhutlata ho aur mun perhta ho to
Kiya uss nay nahi jana kay Allah Taalaa ussay khob dekh raha hai
Yaqeenan ager yeh baaz na raha to hum iski peshani kay baal paker ker ghaseetein gay
Aisi peshani jo jhooti katakar hai
yeh apni majlis walon ko bulalay
hum bhi (dozakh kay)piyadon ko bula lein gy
Khabardar! isska kehna hergiz na manna aur sajda ker aur qareeb hoja
Yaqeenan hum nay issay shab qadar mein nazil farmaya
To kiaya janey kay shab qadar kiya hy
Shab qadar aik hazar maheeno say behter hai
Iss (mein her kaam) kay siranjam denay ko apney rab kay hukum say farishty aur rooh(jibrael)utertay hain
Yeh raat sir-a-sir slamti ki hoti hai aur fajar kay tuloo honay tak(rehti hai)
Ehl-e-kitab kay kafir aur mushrik log jabb tak kay unkay pass zahir daleel na ajaye baz rehnay waly na thay(who daleel yeh thi kay)
Allah Taalaa ka aik rasol jo pak saheefay parhay
jin mein sahi aur durust ehkam hon
Ehl-e-kitab apnay pass zahir daleel ajanay kay baad hi (ikhtilaaf mein par ker) mutafarriq hogaey

Unhein isskay siwa koi hokum nahi diya gaya kay sirf Allah ki ibadat kerein ussi kay liey deen ko khalis rakhein.ibraheem hanif kay deen per aur salat ko qaem rakhein aur zakat dety rahen yehi hai deen sedhi millat ka
Be-shak jo log ehl-e-kitab mein say kafir huye aur mushrikeen sab dozakh ki aag mein(jaeigy)jahan who hamesha(hamesha)reheingy.yeh log bad tareen khalaeeq hain
Be-shak jo log eman laey aur nek amal kiey yeh log behtreen khalaeeq hain

Inn ka badla unkay rab kay pass hameshgi wohi jannaten hein jinkay neechy nehrein beh rahi hein jin mein who hamesha hamesha rahein gay.Allah Taalaa unsy razi hua aur yeh uss say razi huye.yeh hai uskay liey jo apnay perwardigar say daray
Jabb zameen pori tarah jhanjor di jaeygi
Aur apney bojh bahar nikal phenkay gi
Insan kehnay lagay ga kay issay kiya hogaya
Uss din zameen apni sabb khabrein biyan kerdegi
Issliye kay tery rab nay ussy hukam diya hoga
Uss rozlog mukhtalif jamatein hoker(wapis)lotein gay takey unhein unkay aiymaal dikha diey jaein
pus jiss nay zara baraber neki ki hogi who issay dekhlega
Aur jiss nay zara baraber burai ki hogi who ussy dekhlega
Hanpety hoye dorney waly ghoron ki qasam
Phir taap maar ker aag jharnay walon ki qasam
Phir subha kay waqat dhawa bolney walon ki qasam
Pus uss waqat gard-o-ghubar uraty hein
Phir ussi kay sath fojon kay darmiyan ghos jaty hein
Yaqeenan insan apnay rab ka bara nashukra hy
Aur yaqeenan who khud bhi issi per gawah hai
Yeh maal ki muhabbat mein bhi bara sakht hai
Kiya issay who waqat maloom nahi jabb qabron mein jo kuch hy nikal liya jaey ga
Aur seenon ki poshida batein zahir kerdi jaeingi
Be-shak inka rab uss din unkay haal say poora ba-khabar hoga
Kharkhara deney wali
Kiaya hy who kharkhara deney wali
Tujhay kiya maloom kay who kharkhara deney wali kia hy
Jiss din insan bikhray huye perwanon ki tarah hojaeyen gy
Aur pahar dhunay huye rangeen oon ki tarah hojaein gay
phir jiss kay palry bhari hongy
Who to dilpasand aram ki zindagi mein hoga
Aur jiss kay palry halky hongy
uss ka thikana Laaviya hai
Tujhy kia maloom kay yeh kiya hai
woh Tand-o-tez aag (hai)
Zeyadti ki chahat nay tumhein ghafil kerdia
Yahan tak kay tum qabastan ja phunchy
Hergiz nahi tum unqareeb maloom kerlogay
Hergiz nahi phir tumhein jald ilm hojaey ga
Hergiz nahi ager tum yaqeeni tor per jan lo
To be-shak tum jahanum dekhlogay
Aur tum ussy yaqeen ki aankh say dekhlogy
Phir uss din tum say zarror bil-zaroor nematon ka sawal hoga
Zamaney ki qasam
Beyshak (bil-yaqeen)insane sir ta sir nuqsan mein hay
Siwaey un logon kay jo eman laey aur nek amal kiey aur(jinhon nay)apas mein haq ki waseeyat ki aur aik doosry ko sabar ki naseehat ki
Bari kharabi hai her aisy shaks ki jo aib tatolney wala geebat kerney wala ho
Jo maal ko jama kerta jaey or ginta jaey
Woh samjhta hy kay uska maal usky pass sada rahay ga
Hergiz nahi yeh to zaroor tor phor denay wali aag mein phenk diya jaeyga
Aur tujhey kia maloom kay asi aag kiya hogi
Woh Allah Taalaa ki sulgai hoi aag hogi
Jo dilon per charhti chali jaey gi
Who unn per her taraf say band ki hui hogi
Bary bary satoonon mein
Kia tu nay na dekha kay tery rab nay hathi walon kay sath kia kiya
Kia unkay maker ko beykar nai kerdia
Aur unper parindon kay jhond kay jhond bhej diey
Jo unhein mitti or pather ki kankariyan mar rahy thy
Pus unhein khaye huye bhoosy ki tarah kerdiya
Quresh kay manoos kerney kay liye
(yanni) unhen jary aur garmi kay safar say manoos kerney kay liey.(uskay shukriey main)
Pus unhen chahey kay issi gher kay rab ki ibadat kerty rahen
Jiss nay inhen bhook mein khana diya aur darr (aur khof) mein aman (o-aman) diya
Kiya tu nay(ussay bhi)dekha jo (roz) jaza ko jhutlata hai
yehi who hai jo yateem ko dhakkay deta hai
Aur miskeen ko khilaney ki targeeb nahi deta
Un namazion kay liey afsos(aur well nami jahanum ki jagah)hai
Jo apni namaz say ghafil hain
Jo riya kari kerty hein
Aur baratnay ki chez roktay hain
Yaqeenan hum nay tujhay (hoz)kusar (aur bhat kuch) diya hay
Pus tu apney rab kay liey namz parh aur qurbani karo
Yaqeenan tera dushman hi la-waris aur benam-o-nishan hai
Aap khydijey kay aey kafiro
Na mein ibadat kerta hun usski jiss kit um ibadat kerty ho
Na tum ibadat kerney waly ho usski jisski mein ibadat kerta hon
Aur na mein ibadat karon ga uski jisski tum ibadat kerty ho
Aur na tum usski ibadat kerney waly hojisski mein ibadat ker raha hon
Tumhary liey tumhara deen hai aur mery liey mera deen hai
Jab Allah ji madad aur fatah ajaye
Aur tu logon ko ALLAH kay deen mein jok dar jok aata dekh lay
To apnay rabb ki tasbeeh karney lag hamd kay sath aur uss say maghfirat ki dua maang bey shak woh bara hi tauba qabool karney wala hai
Abu Lahab ky dono hath toot gaye aur who (khud) halk ho gaya
Na to uska maal usky kaam aya aur na uski kamai
Who unqareeb bharkney waali aag mein jaey ga
Aur uski biwi bhi(jaeygi)jo lakriyan dhonay waali hai
usski gardan mein post khajoor ki bati hui rassi hogi
Aap kehydijiye kay Woh ALLAH TaALA aik(hi)hai
Allah bey niaz hai
Na uss say koi paida hoa na who kisi say paida hoa
Aur na koi uska humser hai
Aap kehdijiye! Kay mein subha ky Rab ki panah mein aata hun
Her uss cheez ky shar say jo uss nay paida ki hai
Aur andheri raat ki tareki kay shar say jab uska andhera phel jaye
Aur girah(laga ker inn)mein phonknay walon kay sher say(bhi)
Aur hasad kerney waly ki burai say bhi jab wo hasad karey
Aap kehdijiey!kay mein logo kay parwardigar ki panah mein ata hun
Logon ky malik ki(aur)
Logon ky maabood ki(Panah mein)
Waswasa dalney waly pechy hut janey waly kay shar say
Jo logon kay seenon mein waswasa daalta hai
(Khua) woh jinn mein say ho ya insaan mein say
